name: Type & Magic: Chapter 1
description:
Type & Magic is a puzzle platformer where you have to create the platforms yourself. You play as a magician’s apprentice, sent to investigate the ruins of a mysterious castle.

Type the words to create a path to walk on but make sure you don't fall into the traps. Explore the ruins, where the air is prickling with magic, and uncover a dark mystery.

Controls

In-game:
Type highlighted letters to create platforms. (Make sure your input language is set to English!)
Press SPACE to jump.
Holding ENTER will speed up the game.

Menu:
Press ESC to open the game menu, then press the first letter to activate a button (e.g., N for New game).
